li.label: ate raw food
li.description: I had to consume raw food. I would rather it be cooked...

li.label: ate raw food
li.description: I ate raw meat, it was pretty good.

li.label: ate kibble
li.description: I had to eat animal kibble, I feel so degraded.

li.label: hungry
li.description: I'm getting really hungry.

li.label: urgently hungry
li.description: These hunger pangs are hard to ignore.

li.label: starving (trivial)
li.description: It's been so long since I ate. I'm all fuzzy and it's hard to focus.

li.label: starving (minor)
li.description: I can feel my body wasting away. I can't go on like this.

li.label: starving (moderate)
li.description: I can barely think about anything but food. My skin feels brittle and weak. Am I going to die?

li.label: starving (severe)
li.description: I can barely move or think about anything but food. I can't handle this, I feel like I'm going to pass out.

li.label: starving (extreme)
li.description: Food... food... I need... sustenance...

li.label: psychic emanator soothe
li.description: This strange device reminds me of peaceful days.

li.label: psychic soothe
li.description: It's like a calming voice calling out to me, peacefully.

li.label: low psychic drone
li.description: It's like a scratching at the back of my mind. The collective's punishment is clawing at me.

li.label: moderate psychic drone
li.description: They want me, they hate me, they are searching for me and poisoning my mind with their ire. Leave me alone!

li.label: high psychic drone
li.description: The voice of the collective is unbearably loud, they see me... they see me.....

li.label: extreme psychic drone
li.description: I am being watched, a million eyes gazing down at me with hate.

li.label: hideous environment
li.description: What a disgusting dump this place is...

li.label: very ugly environment
li.description: This place really bothers me, I want to leave.

li.label: ugly environment
li.description: This place is unpleasant to be in.

li.label: pleasant environment
li.description: This place reaches my standards.

li.label: very pleasant environment
li.description: I really like this place. It's beautiful.

li.label: beautiful environment
li.description: I am pleased to see we have such a luxuriously beautiful place.

li.label: slept in the cold
li.description: Sleeping in the cold is a very unpleasant experience without much body heat. We really need some heaters.

li.label: slept in the heat
li.description: I had to sleep in the heat, my body reacts poorly to that.. Can't we have air conditioning?

li.label: cold
li.description: My body doesn't handle the cold well.

li.label: very cold
li.description: I'm so cold. My head aches. Can't get warm.

li.label: freezing
li.description: I have an intense headache from the cold, I need to get warm.

li.label: hot
li.description: This heat is unpleasant.

li.label: very hot
li.description: I'm really overheated.

li.label: extremely hot
li.description: I feel like I'm in an oven! I'm not sure how long I can handle this.

li.label: burning up
li.description: I'm burning up, my flesh is drying out. I think I could die from this heat!

li.label: naked
li.description: I am stripped of my dignity.

li.label: slept outside
li.description: I had to sleep outdoors in the filth...

li.label: new colony optimism
li.description: We just landed here. It's a tough situation, and I am a bit paranoid, but I'm excited to be founding a new colony.
